mapper.insert: insert into channel (ORG_ID, CHANNEL_NBR, CHANNEL_NAME, CHANNEL_CLASS, SALES_FIRST_TYPE, SALES_SECOND_TYPE, SALES_THIRD_TYPE, CHN_TYPE_CD, PARTY_ID, CHANNEL_DESC, CHANNEL_LEVEL, APPLY_CODE, REGION_ID, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF) values (#{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{channelNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salesFirstType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salesSecondType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salesThirdType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chnTypeCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{channelDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update channel set CHANNEL_NBR = #{channelNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHANNEL_NAME = #{channelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHANNEL_CLASS = #{channelClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SALES_FIRST_TYPE = #{salesFirstType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SALES_SECOND_TYPE = #{salesSecondType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SALES_THIRD_TYPE = #{salesThirdType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHN_TYPE_CD = #{chnTypeCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARTY_ID = #{partyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CHANNEL_DESC = #{channelDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHANNEL_LEVEL = #{channelLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPLY_CODE = #{applyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REGION_ID = #{regionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT} where ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select ORG_ID, CHANNEL_NBR, CHANNEL_NAME, CHANNEL_CLASS, SALES_FIRST_TYPE, SALES_SECOND_TYPE, SALES_THIRD_TYPE, CHN_TYPE_CD, PARTY_ID, CHANNEL_DESC, CHANNEL_LEVEL, APPLY_CODE, REGION_ID, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF from channel
